alert.note: Alert for Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 06 at 2:40PM MDT until June 06 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Sweet Grass County in south central Montana... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 240 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in and around Sweetgrass Creek. Radar estimates of between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, highways, and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Rural roads may become impassable. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Sweet Grass County FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Please report observed flooding to local emergency officials and request they pass the information to the National Weather Service in Billings.
